title: Banned for 3rd Party software when I've never used it before?!?!?
body: It said that I have been banned for the use for a 3rd party software. I have never in all my time playing League of legends use a 3rd party software for any sort of reason on any of my accounts. I am very angry and displeased that I have been banned for such a thing. I was playing on my account today (2016,01,11) at my college and about 8 hours later when I get home from school I have my account banned. This makes no sense what so ever and I would like to have my account back please. I have been playing League of Legends since Season 3 and have bought tons of RP. I have done nothing wrong. I have never used any sort of 3rd party software to gain any advantage on players or in general. I do not understand why I have been banned?? This is honestly unbelievable. I have been playing League of Legends for 3 years and never got banned. I have been toxic in the past and I got my rightful chat bans for it and served my time for what I did. But this, this is ridiculous. I have never used anything to cheat or give an unfair advantage to any players. I have worked very hard to achieve the rank that I have and spent countless amount of money and time into this account and I would appreciate if I would be able to get it back. As I have done nothing wrong.

replies.body:
Heya CheesyTimes,

As some other players have correctly identified, you were having your account boosted during the detection period (mid-October, specifically).  Your booster utilized a scripting application, and while it might not feel like you were directly responsible, all 28 games spent cheating left significant impact on the integrity of your account and to the competitive experience of other players.  

Even during stretches of intense sharing, an account is ultimately responsible for the actions taken on it, and with that in mind, I'd encourage you to review our security guidelines, [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account#h2q1)

Thus, we have a supposition of trolling, which was justified. Since a label of trolling is a judgement based on your actions, and not your character or some other feature of you unrelated to the matter at hand, it is not an Ad Hominem fallacy. 

The fact of the matter is you are posting on the NA forums which is filled with native English speakers. Many of whom are sole-speakers of the language for decades. What you've done by admitting to not being a native speaker is set yourself up as an ignorant in a room full of the informed. You are effectively standing on a soap box loudly proclaiming your mistaken belief right while everyone around you is quietly telling you get down and stop making a fool of yourself.

I've given you the time of day because of the slim chance that you are not trolling, high, or something else of that nature. My hope is instead you are vastly over-estimating your understanding understanding of the English language compared to your peers. Please don't make me regret it.
